short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Diaspora extension enables you to checkout on Amazon and get your item shipped to your doorstep in Africa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of buying a limited variety of goods that are often highly priced within the Kenyan online market?

Diaspora Prime is East Africa's leading drop-shipping e-commerce retailer. Using Diaspora Prime, it takes you seconds to order any product online from around the world through Amazon.com. You can order without a credit card, pay using M-Pesa or Airtel Money, and your order is delivered to your door.

Never worry about shipping, packaging, or holding inventory
